class.name: FmodBank
class.brief_description: Represents a loaded FMOD Studio bank containing audio content and metadata.
class.description:
FmodBank represents a loaded FMOD Studio bank file. Banks are containers that hold audio content including event definitions, audio samples, bus configurations, and VCA settings.
Banks are created by FMOD Studio and contain: - Event descriptions that define how audio events behave - Audio samples (unless streamed from separate files) - Bus hierarchy for mixing and effects - VCA (Volume Control Automation) configurations - String tables for event/bus/VCA names
Banks can be loaded synchronously or asynchronously. Use [method FmodServer.load_bank] to load banks and [method get_loading_state] to check if an asynchronous load has completed.
Banks must be loaded before their contained events, buses, or VCAs can be used. Typically, you'll load a "Master" bank first (which contains bus/VCA definitions) followed by content banks containing specific events.

method.name: get_bus_count
method.description: Returns the number of buses defined in this bank.

method.name: get_bus_list
method.description: Returns an array of all [FmodBus] objects defined in this bank.

method.name: get_description_list
method.description: Returns an array of all [FmodEventDescription] objects defined in this bank.

method.name: get_event_description_count
method.description: Returns the number of event descriptions defined in this bank.

method.name: get_loading_state
method.description: Returns the loading state of the bank. See FMOD_STUDIO_LOADING_STATE enum for possible values: - FMOD_STUDIO_LOADING_STATE_UNLOADING: Bank is being unloaded - FMOD_STUDIO_LOADING_STATE_UNLOADED: Bank is not loaded - FMOD_STUDIO_LOADING_STATE_LOADING: Bank is currently loading - FMOD_STUDIO_LOADING_STATE_LOADED: Bank is fully loaded and ready - FMOD_STUDIO_LOADING_STATE_ERROR: An error occurred during loading

method.name: get_string_count
method.description: Returns the number of strings in the bank's string table. This includes names for events, buses, VCAs, and parameters.

method.name: get_vca_count
method.description: Returns the number of VCAs (Volume Control Automation) defined in this bank.

method.name: get_vca_list
method.description: Returns an array of all [FmodVCA] objects defined in this bank.

method.name: update_bank_data
method.description: Forces an update of the bank's cached data including event descriptions, buses, and VCAs. This is typically called automatically but can be useful if the bank content changes at runtime.
